thread.section_title: Lodge In Mis - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome place
thread.title_full: Awesome place - Review of Lodge In Mis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Aguirresaravia
title: Awesome place
text:
A very calm place. Absolutelly clean.
The breakfast is complete!! The rooms are very nice. The beds are very confortables. Is located close to the rue Peripherique and that makes a place very easy to acces. Many thanks to all the staff, allways with a smile and ready for make you feel confortable. I would like to be back. Merci beaucoup!!
